entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
